channel.title: Comments on: Get to know our editors: Dana Mele
channel.description: Stellar Short Fiction by Women-Identified Writers Since 2010

item.title: By: Jody
item.dc:creator: Jody
item.description: So awesome to meet you, Dana! Excellent series, Jennifer. Fascinating women supporting fascinating women! Love being a part of the LSQ family!
item.content:encoded: So awesome to meet you, Dana! Excellent series, Jennifer. Fascinating women supporting fascinating women! Love being a part of the LSQ family!
